nodes.text: This World Devastator was a former Imperial starship used by the New Republic.

The Devastator survived the sabotage of the collective system of the deadly factory ship fleets at the conclusion of the Battle of Calamari in 10 ABY. It was reprogrammed by the New Republic, who used it to devour and recycle derelict space craft in orbit of Da Soocha V. However, the ship, and any other World Devastators that the New Republic captured, ended up scrapped after a public outcry.
Dark Horse Comics editor Bob Cooper indicates that this World Devastator was scuttled above Da Soocha V.
